svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.5 Chrome/126.0.6478.183 Electron/31.3.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.5" scale="1" border="20"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="Icsr8bo7XXVqNTokq4He"> <mxGraphModel dx="1238" dy="729" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" background="#0D1117" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#0D1117;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="465.5" y="283" width="250" height="450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-41" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#0D1117;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="136.5" y="283" width="250" height="450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-16" value="<h1>VLCD Client</h1>" style="shape=label;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#0050ef;strokeColor=#001DBC;fontColor=#ffffff;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="164" y="606" width="195" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-34" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" target="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-23" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="595.5" y="606" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="595.5" y="443.5" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-45" value="<h1>ESP8266 (NodeMCU)</h1>" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="136.5" y="223" width="257.5" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-46" value="<h1>PC</h1>" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="558" y="223" width="45" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fillColor=none;" parent="1" source="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-16" target="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-24" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="344" y="596" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="466.5" y="648.5" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-27" value="TCP / UDP" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=#0D1117;" parent="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-3" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.0135" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-4" y="-1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-17" value="<h1>USER</h1>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="134" y="778" width="581.5" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.785;exitY=0.005;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-17" target="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="559.5" y="778" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="559" y="743" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-20" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-41" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="261.5" y="753" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="261.5" y="778" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-21" value="<h1>OLED Display</h1>" style="shape=label;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#a0522d;strokeColor=#6D1F00;fontColor=#ffffff;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="164" y="465.5" width="195" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-22" value="<h1>Game Logic</h1>" style="shape=label;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;fontColor=#ffffff;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="164" y="318" width="195" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-23" value="<h1>Key Pressed</h1>" style="shape=label;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#6a00ff;strokeColor=#3700CC;fontColor=#ffffff;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="498" y="318" width="195" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-24" value="<h1>VLCD</h1>" style="shape=label;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;fontColor=#ffffff;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="498" y="606" width="195" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-25" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-21" target="bd8QJbX_fTNZzXZ-dr_y-16" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="235.5" y="548" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="285.5" y="498" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-26" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-22" target="znx83Sca4jhyTBnRcJQG-21" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="315.5" y="538" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="365.5" y="488" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
